error.message: Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead create a \Drupal\Core\Url object directly, for example using Url::fromRoute().

Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.
Call to deprecated method url() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Please use toUrl() instead.

Call to deprecated method link() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\EntityInterface::toLink()->toString() instead.
Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.
Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.
Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.
Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.
Call to deprecated function format_string(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Render\FormattableMarkup instead.

Call to deprecated method getUsername() of class Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Session\AccountInterface::getAccountName() or \Drupal\user\UserInterface::getDisplayName() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to poll.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
